titles.title: Banking Restrictions Involving North Korea (BRINK) Act of 2017
Banking Restrictions Involving North Korea (BRINK) Act of 2017
A bill to impose sanctions with respect to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and for other purposes.
Banking Restrictions Involving North Korea (BRINK) Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
